name: The Afterworld
overview: Hi there, gamefreak! Before you push the button, let me warn you that playing this game can cause lots of irritation because it is almost impossible to finish it. But let's see what you can do. From now on you are no longer alive. It is your task to become an inhabitant of the most beautiful place in the universe, The Afterworld. However, the boss of The Afterworld allows only the best people in his land. This means that you will have to deserve your place in The Afterworld by proving your strength, intelligence and speed by completing a number of tests, within a time limit. If you succeed, then you are worth being an inhabitant of The Afterworld. If not, then do not worry and try again. I wish you all the luck in the world and you will need it." Published in Italy under the name "To Get Rid Of" in Formula 64 n.99.
